title: Stocks Rise on Soft September Data That Boosts Rate-Cut Bets | The Close 12/5/2025
description: Bloomberg Television brings you the latest news and analysis leading up to the final minutes and seconds before and after the closing bell on Wall Street. Today's guests are ADP’s Nela Richardson, Wells Fargo Investment’s Paul Christopher, Seaport Research Partners’ David Joyce, SPG Global’s Simon Gallagher, HSBC’s Nicole Inui, MNTN’s Mark Douglas, Build-A-Bear Workshop’s Sharon Price John, FIFA World Cup 26 NYNJ’s Alex Lasry. (Source: Bloomberg)
